task.title: How to clean the moka pot before first use?
task.shortdesc: What you should do before you brew coffee for the first time

taskbody.context:
Perform this cleaning only once before using a new moka pot for the first time.
The first brewing is carried out to clean the moka pot out before using it. You also make sure the pressure relief valve is working ok.
Before using the new moka pot for the first time:

step.cmd: Fill the heating vessel with cool fresh water up to the level of the pressure relief valve.
Put some old used coffee grounds in the filter basket, attach the coffee collector and allow it to brew.
Throw away the first coffee brewed in the new pot.
